choices.A: Hierarchical multi-tier network topology is not supported as an underlay network in NSX-T Data Center.
choices.C: Spine and leaf network topology must be used as an underlay network in NSX-T Data Center.
choices.B: NSX-T Data Center can work with any existing underlay network topology as long as other prerequisites are satisfied.
choices.D: Spine and leaf network topology is not supported as an underlay network in NSX-T Data Center.
